categories: Category:Learn to Read with Star Wars

nodes.text: Learn to Read with Star Wars: Chewie Level 1

Learn to Read with Star Wars: Chewie Level 1 is a box set collecting four Level 1 young-readers titles in the DK Readers series. The collected books include Star Wars: The Force Awakens: New Adventures (David Fentiman), Luke Skywalker's Amazing Story (Simon Beecroft), What is a Wookiee? (Tori Kosara), and Star Wars: Who Saved the Galaxy? (Catherine Saunders). It was published by DK Publishing on December 12, 2017, and was available exclusively through retailer Barnes & Noble.
